    • register

      Description copied from interface: IViewModel
      The method check if the user exist and if not created a new user
      Specified by:
      register in interface IViewModel
      Parameters:
      iUserName - the new user username, can't be null
      iPassword - the new user password, can't be null
      iCountry - the new user country, can't be null
      iGander - the new user gander, can't be null
      Returns:
      true if new user registered or false if the user already exists
